topics.body:
Well I may no longer be a brony, but I finally got around to seeing the end of season 4.

My thoughts on it summarized:
!https://derpicdn.net/img/2012/7/31/63114/full.jpg!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b6793c636872634f350700#post_53b6793c636872634f350700
Heh

Before I go to bed, I'm going to talk about one of your older posts on how it would actually suck to live in certain worlds, For pokemon, The criminal organizations wouldn't be that big of a deal, They're fairly localized, And they never go all the way through (And they don't happen *That* Often)

The problem though, It may not be obvious, But the Pokemon world is Very Fucking dangerous if you think about it (The Pokedex entrys make it clear that there's a good reason why they don't let you leave town without a Pokemon of your own)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b67ac6636872550e780200#post_53b67ac6636872550e780200
I thought that the entire world almost got destroyed in one of the games.

Yeah; x & y wasn't there a giant super weapon powered by a pokemon representing death used by team flare?  I'm pretty sure a giant death laser counts as dangerous.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b67d12636872024ea10800#post_53b67d12636872024ea10800

What about in Black 2 when the team (forgot what it was called) iced up that one town, literally freezing the road and sending gigantic glaciers everywhere? People could have been easily killed if the ice had stayed there for a while; it's not like people stocked up on food, and besides, the temperature alone could have been deadly.

The teams are getting more and more dangerous over the years.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442
